column4: All:  See there is no way to disable IPv6 from synaptic so had to follow HOWTO at: http://www.webupd8.org/2010/05/how-to-disable-ipv6-in-ubuntu-1004.html  Hope this is all good, as from the descript will have to go down for reboot on this.
I'll give ya'll a little time to comment, before I reboot.  Thanks!
why would you want to disable ipv6 Â¿ o_O that's crazy
